welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nettetal, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our city known for its scenic landscapes and quaint villages. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the wonderful things Nettetal has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Moenchen-gl. - Dus Exp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Moenchen-gl. - Dus Exp Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weeze Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Weeze Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, dedicated to long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 24-hour limit per device.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essen Airport, mainly used for regional and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.
